PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2000-06402000-05-040,  ,  ,  ,  TB,  AGRI-FOOD,  , 
PrecisAmendments to the TERMS and CONDITIONS of the SPRING CREDIT ADVANCE PROGRAM (a program designed to provide financial assistance to producers in the form of interest-free cash advances) that will allow producers in Quebec to use their provincial Agricultural Income Stabilization Insurance Payments as collateral for the advances.
Attachments
